caption: Inside a room, several women gathered around a fire. In their midst was a woman holding a wine glass, conversing with those next to her. Another person approached to brief her on a situation. Upon hearing the report, she immediately issued orders. Some tried to dissuade her, but she was resolute in her decision. Outside the city, the besiegers planned to scale the walls using ladders, engaging in fierce combat with the defenders. Reinforcements for the defenders continuously arrived by ship. These new forces commenced their assault and even brought battering rams, using them to forcefully pound at the main gates.
